document_data.name: Race
document_data.mainbody: The '''Race''' was a stretch of water located off the southern edge of the [[Tethyr Peninsula]] in [[west Faer√ªn]]. The sea was named for the strong winds through it
document_data.Usage: In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the Race and [[Asavir's Channel]] were used to reach the wealthy ports of the south, but such shipping was harassed by pirates based in the nearby [[Nelanther Isles]].  Once through the Race, merchant ships came under the protection of the [[Calimshan]] navy.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1356}}, the [[Companions of the Hall]] traveled through the Race after escaping the pirate [[Pinochet]]'s fleet and landed in [[Memnon]].
